segments.text: Yes , can I cash my traveler's check here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , we'd be happy to cash it for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's listed on the electronic board on the left . We cash it at present traveler's check buying rate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . How much it the service charge ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The service charge is 1 % of the total amount of the check .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'd like to cash these four checks for $ 100 each .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please countersign them here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I forgot to bring it . It is in my hotel room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , sir . We can't cash the checks for you without your passport .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , thanks . I will come again this afternoon , then .
segments.speaker: S2
